mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.cover,ec.price, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne,es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo, et.name AS teacherName FROM edu_course ec INNER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id=et.id INNER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id =es1.id INNER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id=#{id}
